title: Blazing 5 - Week 13
itunes:title: Blazing 5 - Week 13
description:
Colin goes over his Blazing 5 picks a few days early this week with RJ Bell of Pregame.com and Fox Sports Radio who tells him which games the wise guys in Vegas agree or disagree with. Here are the games Colin and RJ go over in week 13:


49ers @ Ravens

Redskins @ Panthers

Eagles @ Dolphins

Rams @ Cardinals

Raiders @ Chiefs


Plus, Colin reveals a 6th bonus pick exclusive to this podcast.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
